DOC.brief_summary: This study is to to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of sofosbuvir (SOF) plus ribavirin (RBV) in Egyptian adults with genotype 4 hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection.
DOC.brief_title: Sofosbuvir Plus Ribavirin Administered for Either 12 or 24 Weeks in Treatment-Naive and Treatment-Experienced Egyptian Adults With Chronic Genotype 4 Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infection
